# idn

```
http://www.iana.org/domains/idn-tables/tables/cn_zh-cn_4.0.html
http://www.iana.org/domains/idn-tables/tables/tw_zh-tw_4.0.1.html
```

## Install

```
$ npm install idn
```


## Usage

```js
var idn = require('idn');

console.log(JSON.stringify(idn("衣带渐宽终不悔")));
```
